articles.title: Bajaj Auto sees 2W industry sales growing 7-8% in FY25, e2W sales growth in 'high teens' - Autocar Professional
articles.description: Growth in the two-wheeler industry is seen at 7-8 percent year-on-year, driven by higher sales in the 125 cc + segment with entry-level motorcycles remaining under pressure, according to Bajaj Auto Executive Director Rakesh Sharma.
